page.title: 07MARSHALLS CHUNKY CHICKEN
page.content: The Marshalls Chunky Chicken farm lies two miles north of Dunfermline.It employs twelve workers,six of whom are part-time.The manager and foreman live in cottages on the same site. There are four chicken houses each housing eight and a half thousand deep litter hens producing one hundred and seventy thousand eggs.These are transfered to a hatchery by lorry from where the broiler chicks are taken to another farm.They are then fattened for several weeks before being slaughtered.After packaging they are sent to supermarkets and freezer centres for sale to the general public.
